job_purpose: To develop and maintain robust software solutions to enhance the efficiency of aged care and disability services at Austa Care.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design, develop, and implement software applications supporting business operations.
Analyze user requirements and system specifications to provide tailored technical solutions for aged care and disability sectors.
Modify and optimize existing software systems to meet evolving business needs, enhance functionality, and ensure performance and security.
Conduct thorough testing and debugging of software to ensure high-quality and reliable solutions.
Provide ongoing support, maintenance, and troubleshooting for software applications.
Prepare clear technical documentation for developed systems.
Participate in project planning, estimation, and tracking to ensure timely delivery within budget constraints.
Stay updated with industry trends to continuously improve and innovate existing systems.
required_qualifications: Minimum 8+ years' experience in software development.
Strong programming skills in Java, Python, C#, or JavaScript.
Ability to identify issues, analyze root causes, and develop effective solutions.
Proficiency in English and Mandarin is an advantage.
Strong analytical thinking, problem-solving skills, and ability to learn new technologies.
Effective communication and strong time management abilities.
company_details: Austa Care is a government-certified care service organization in Greater Sydney, specializing in culturally inclusive health and aged care solutions. The organization empowers seniors and individuals with disabilities to age with confidence and quality of life.
